snippet: Opponents of the Syrian government say the American focus on the Islamic State has allowed government forces to renew attacks on rebellious areas.
abstract: Opponents of Syrian government say American focus on Islamic State militants has allowed government forces of Pres Bashar al-Assad to renew attacks on rebellious areas.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut, and Eric Schmitt from Washington. Karam Shoumali contributed reporting from Mursitpinar, Turkey, and Mohammad Ghannam and Hwaida Saad from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: Opponents of the Syrian government say the American focus on the Islamic State has allowed government forces to renew attacks on rebellious areas.

headline.main: U.S. Focus on ISIS Frees Syria to Battle Rebels
headline.print_headline: American Focus on Islamic State Frees Syria to Battle Rebels

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
